pages.text: You will know everything about wither skeleton organs here.

pages.title: Wither Skeleton Ribs
pages.text: Blaze Ribs immune your Gulber of Wither effect.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Here is the recipe for the wither skeleton ribs.

pages.title: Wither Skeleton Heart
pages.text: Blaze Heart spawn Wither Skeleton at the death of your Gulber.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Here is the recipe for the wither skeleton heart.

pages.title: Wither Skeleton Muscle
pages.text: Wither Skeleton Muscle set attacked entity in fire.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Here is the recipe for the wither skeleton muscle.
